description: Manage a Service Level Objective in Dynatrace.

Endpoint.description: Endpoint URL to access Dynatrace API

ErrorBudgetBurnRate.description: Error budget burn rate configuration of a service-level objective (SLO).

FastBurnThreshold.description: The threshold between a slow and a fast burn rate.

BurnRateVisualizationEnabled.description:
The error budget burn rate visualization is enabled (true) or disabled (false).

In case of false, no calculated values will be present here.

BurnRateValue.description: The burn rate of the SLO, calculated for the last hour.

BurnRateType.description:
The calculated burn rate type.

Has a value of 'FAST', 'SLOW' or 'NONE'.

SloValue.description: The calculated value of the SLO for the timeframe chosen for the burn rate calculation.

EstimatedTimeToConsumeErrorBudget.description: The estimated time left to consume the error budget in hours.

MetricName.description: The name for a metric expression.

MetricExpression.description: The percentage-based metric expression for the calculation of the SLO.

EvaluationType.description: The evaluation type of the SLO.

Filter.description: The entity filter for the SLO evaluation. Use the syntax of entity selector (https://dt-url.net/entityselector).

Target.description: The target value of the SLO.

Warning.description:
The warning value of the SLO.

At warning state the SLO is still fulfilled but is getting close to failure.

Timeframe.description: The timeframe for the SLO evaluation. Use the syntax of the global timeframe selector.

Enabled.description: The SLO is enabled (true) or disabled (false).

BurnRateMetricKey.description: The error budget burn rate key for a metric expression.

ProblemFilter.description: The entity filter for fetching the number of problems related to an SLO. Auto-generated in case no filter has been added to the SLO.

RelatedOpenProblems.description:
Number of OPEN problems related to the SLO.

Has the value of -1 if there's an error with fetching SLO related problems.

RelatedTotalProblems.description:
Total number of problems related to the SLO.

Has the value of -1 if there's an error with fetching SLO related problems.

HasAccess.description: The SLO is accessible through the settings if hasAccess is true.

EvaluatedPercentage.description:
The calculated value of the SLO. Has the value of the evaluated SLO or the value of -1:

    If there is an error with the SLO calculation; in that case check the value of the error property.
    If the evaluate parameter has not been set to true; in that case the error property will contain no error.

ErrorBudget.description:
The error budget of the calculated SLO.

The error budget is the difference between the calculated and target values. A positive number means all is good; a negative number means trouble.

MetricKey.description: The key for a metric expression. Once created, metric keys can't be changed.

Status.description: The status of the calculated SLO.

Error.description:
The error of the SLO calculation.

If the value differs from NONE there's something wrong with the SLO calculation.
